FROM kubevirt/registry-disk-v1alpha

MAINTAINER "The KubeVirt Project" <kubevirt-dev@googlegroups.com>

# Add fedora cloud disk image
RUN curl -f -g -L https://download.fedoraproject.org/pub/fedora/linux/releases/27/CloudImages/x86_64/images/Fedora-Cloud-Base-27-1.6.x86_64.qcow2 > /disk/fedora.qcow2
